text: Yeonsangun of Joseon (, 1476 - 1506) was the tenth King of the Joseon Dynasty. His real name was Yi Yung (). His posthumous name was Heoncheonhongdogyeongmunwimudaewang (). Son's of King Seongjong, great- grandson of Sejong the Great. ==Related pages== * Deposed Queen Lady Yun == References == * http://enc.daum.net/dic100/contents.do?query1=b15a3307b Category:1476 births Category:1506 deaths Category:Korean politicians Category:Kings of Joseon
title: Yeonsangun of Joseon
